component.name: Passphraser
component.summary: Phrase-based password generator that can use your own list of words

description.p: Passphraser is a password generator that accepts any text file and treats each word as a possible input. So a text file like this...

p.code: alpha bravo charlie delta echo foxtrot

description.p: ...will result in a generated password like this with the default settings.
The included word lists are derived from the EFF's New Wordlists for Random Passphrases
